mapper.select: select p.name productName,c.name categoryName,p.deposit deposit,p.dailyPrice dailyPrice, p.discountDailyPrice discountDailyPrice,p.currentInventory currentInventory,p.totalInventory totalInventory,p.introduce introduce, p.parameter parameter,p.isDelete isDelete from (product p) join (category c) on p.categoryId = c.id limit #{pageNum},10
